snippet: The fish is found throughout much of the Eastern Seaboard and breeds in several river systems, but the majority of stripers in New York are a gift of the Hudson River....
abstract: NYC Nature column on striped bass, fish with pin-striped scales and that thrives in New York City's salt and fresh waters.
lead_paragraph: The fish is found throughout much of the Eastern Seaboard and breeds in several river systems, but the majority of stripers in New York are a gift of the Hudson River.
